summary: Remove ScriptDragon and SkyBoost completely from your Skyrim folder
descriptionHtml:
In the event a new patch has rendered the current available ScriptDragon and SkyBoost useless, or you simply wish to remove ScriptDragon, this may assist you.
Remove ScriptDragon and SkyBoost from your Skyrim folder completely.

1. Download ScriptDragon and SkyBoost Remover
2. Extract it to your Skyrim folder
3. Run ScriptDragon and SkyBoost Remover

Files that are removed:
-- ScriptDragon v1.5.26.0 file list;
dinput8.dll
horsespawner.asi
horsespawner.ini
ScriptDragon.dll
trainer.asi
trainer.ini
undress.asi
undress.ini
weather.asi
weather.ini
-- SkyBoost R5 test 3 file list;
dinput8.dll
SkyBoost.asi

No user prompt for independent file deletion will be provided. Once you commit to removing ScriptDragon and SkyBoost completely, all files that came packed with  ScriptDragon and SkyBoost will be removed from your Skyrim folder in completeness. If you happen to have something else that uses dinput8.dll or any of the other ScriptDragon and SkyBoost files, do not use this.
author: Guru82
